means: （向女子）求爱，求婚( woo的现在分词 )
（尤用于报纸）争取得到…的支持

sentence.Network_en: This election has been marked so far by the candidates' wooing of each other's traditional political bases.
sentence.Network_cn: 到目前为止，这次选举的特色是候选人争取获得彼此传统政治大本营的支持。

sentence.Network_en: Moderates are plagiarizing his ideas in hopes of wooing voters.
sentence.Network_cn: 温和派为讨好选民在盗用他的观点。

sentence.Network_en: She now assiduously set about wooing the chauvinist editors of Fleet Street.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时候,她千方百计地争取舰队街那些盲目爱国的编辑们.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Widespread abuses in other African countries that Turkey is wooing could yet cause further headaches ., 土耳其太过泛滥地向其他非洲国家示好还会引起更多的烦恼.
中级口译翻译教材第二版词汇 -... ... 总统职位 presidency 争取选民的游说 wooing 独裁者 dictator.

list.abs: 胡绍基(Michael Woo),美国洛杉矶市总规划师 (Los Angels City Planning Commissioner) 彭仲仁(Peng Zhongren),美国佛罗里达大学城 …
在吴宇森（John Woo）的《喋血双雄》（The Killer）中，杀手（周润发 / Chow Yun-fat）完成任务后逃到渡头，但在那里遭到其委托 …
香港知名的导演吴宇森（John Woo），1946年9月22岁出生在广州。今年即将满66岁的吴宇森被曝出患有喉癌，目前正在美国接受治 …
您现在的位置：首页 > 音乐 > 所有歌手 > 电视原声 > 男保姆 > 春日-(Sang Woo) > 电视原声的全部专辑歌手首页 MV 港台男歌手港台 …
但吴光正（Peter Woo）并不这么看。这位亿万富豪能亲身感受到那些经济效益。

entry.def: If you woo people, you try to encourage them to help you, support you, or vote for you, for example by promising them things which they would like.

example.ex: They wooed customers by offering low interest rates...
example.tran: 他们靠提供低息来招揽客户。

example.ex: They are trying to woo back electoral support.
example.tran: 他们正试图赢回选民的支持。

entry.tran: 追求(女人);向(女人)求爱（或求婚）
entry.def: If a man woos a woman, he spends time with her and tries to persuade her to marry him.

example.ex: The penniless author successfully wooed and married Fanny.
example.tran: 这位一文不名的作家向范妮求爱成功，和她结了婚。

means.word_mean: 1. a man's courting of a woman; seeking the affections of a woman (usually with the hope of marriage);

sentences.sentence: "its was a brief and intense courtship"

auth_sentence.content: So even as he wooed voters he was also wooing her.
auth_sentence.res_content: So even as he wooed voters he was also wooing her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So even as he wooed voters he was also wooing her.

auth_sentence.content: She succumbed to his persistent wooing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She succumbed to his persistent wooing.

auth_sentence.content: Tony lolls about in his Chelsea townhouse, lackadaisically wooing Wendy Craig.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tony lolls about in his Chelsea townhouse, lackadaisically wooing Wendy Craig.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tony lolls about in his Chelsea townhouse, lackadaisically wooing Wendy Craig.
